core_balloon_info: تم تصغير محرك الخلفيات, انقر مرتين لإختيار خلفية
core_balloon_video_error: حدث خطأ في الفيديو {{err}}. انقر للمساعدة.
core_msgbox_deskscapes: قد يمنع هذا محرك الخلفيات من العمل بشكل صحيح DeskScape يبدو أن
core_msgbox_prompt_aero_win7: Wallpaper Engine needs to enable Aero in order to work. Enable Aero now?
core_msgbox_prompt_aero_win8: Wallpaper Engine cannot run with a 'high contrast' theme. Reset theme now?
core_msgbox_aero_denied: Wallpaper Engine cannot work without Aero and will now quit.
core_msgbox_aero_failure: Failed to enable Aero. Wallpaper Engine will now quit.
core_msgbox_aero_failure_no_support: Failed to enable Aero. You appear to be using a Starter or Basic version of Windows 7, which does not support Aero and does not fulfill the minimum system requirements. Wallpaper Engine will now quit.
core_msgbox_init_secondinstance_ask_quit:
Wallpaper Engine appears to be running already and doesn't respond.

Do you want to restart it forcefully?
core_msgbox_below_win_7:
Wallpaper Engine requires Windows 7 or up, as indicated by the system requirements on Steam.

It appears that you are running an unsupported version of Windows and Wallpaper Engine may not work.
core_msgbox_media_feature_pack_missing:
mfplat.dll missing!
You possibly have Windows N. Please install the Media Feature Pack by Microsoft to enable video support! (Google: Media Feature Pack Windows 10/8.1/7)
core_updater_headline_init_complete: اكتمل اعداد النسخة {{version}}. جاري بدء محرك الخلفيات...
core_updater_headline_update_complete: اكتمل تحديث النسخة {{version}}. جاري بدء محرك الخلفيات...
core_updater_status_distro_prepare_error: فشل التعزيز أثناء فحص مصدر المسار {{error}}
core_updater_status_distro_copy_error: خطأ في التعزيز اثناء نسخ الملفات
core_updater_status_verify_failed_messag:
The verification of the following files failed. Please verify the files over Steam (right click, properties, local files, verify). This can happen due to download errors in Steam or anti-virus programs falsely detecting files and causing problems. If you have an anti-virus that is not from Microsoft, make sure that it does not interfere with Steam and Wallpaper Engine.

{{filenames}}
core_updater_status_compat: جاري البحث عن برامج غير متوافقة
core_updater_status_compat_message_box_b:
You have the following applications running that may cause Wallpaper Engine to crash or make your system unstable. They inject code into Wallpaper Engine that causes issues. Make sure to add Wallpaper Engine to their exclusion list by adding wallpaper32.exe and wallpaper64.exe there.

{{list}}
